arguments.name: reportSpam
arguments.description: Whether we can still report the user for spam

arguments.name: addContact
arguments.description: Whether we can add the user as contact

arguments.name: shareContact
arguments.description: Whether we can share the user's contact

arguments.name: needContactsException
arguments.description: Whether a special exception for contacts is needed

arguments.name: reportGeo
arguments.description: Whether we can report a geo group is irrelevant for this location

arguments.name: autoarchived
arguments.description: Whether this peer was automatically archived according to globalPrivacySettings

arguments.name: geoDistance
arguments.description: Distance in meters between us and this peer
